name: Chai Spice Eggnog
description: A delicious blend of Chai Spice and creamy eggnog, this is a great crowd-pleaser for a seasonal celebration.
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, combine chai spice, milk, and eggnog.
Bring to a gentle simmer, then remove from heat. Keep warm or chill.
Pour into mugs. If desired, pour a 1⁄2 oz shot of rum into each. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.
tips: You can make and refrigerate 1–2 days ahead – simply reheat or serve cold. Delish!
DIY Bar Tip: Make and refrigerate in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup for a cool drink, or simply keep on low heat for hot toddies. Place glasses and nutmeg by pot.
